name: VolleyBomb (Rubengo)
description:
1º game: A timer possession game where players must pass the ball to the opposite court before time runs out. If a player has possession of the ball when the time is up, he loses. Above each field there is a hole. If the player strains the ball into the hole in his field, he earns a point. 2º game: Speed game where players will have to dodge the bombs on the stage where there will also be balls to deflect. Players can drive balls by hitting them with their heads. Controls:

                                   Jump                  Left                      Right

Player 1                    W                         A                            D

Player 2                      ↑                        ←                           →

This game was developed by:

- Natalia Adrover: game design

- Guillermo González: game and level design

- Rubén González: game desing and programming

Hope you enjoy it!
